question: {name1} slew {n1} {creature} with his mighty {weapon1}, while {name2}, using a {weapon2}, slew a fraction of {frac1} as many {creature} as {name1}. Using a {weapon3}, {name3} slew {mult1} as many {creature} as {name2}. But {name4}, having forgotten his {weapon4} at home, slew a fraction of {frac2} as many {creature} as {name3} using a {weapon5}. How many {creature} has {name4} slain?
